Sentencas: Performance degradation of cathodes caused by chromium deposition and poisoning is one of the major challenges to overcome for long-term operation of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Roles of humidity and cathodic current in chromium poisoning of Sr-doped LaMnO3-based cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: To fundamentally understand the mechanisms of the degradation phenomenon, it is necessary to investigate the roles of humidity and cathodic current in chromium poisoning.
Titulo: Roles of humidity and cathodic current in chromium poisoning of Sr-doped LaMnO3-based cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this study, anode-supported SOFCs, with Sr-doped LaMnO3 (LSM) based cathode are employed.
Titulo: Roles of humidity and cathodic current in chromium poisoning of Sr-doped LaMnO3-based cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These cells are electrochemically tested at 800 degrees C with and without chromia-forming interconnect.
Titulo: Roles of humidity and cathodic current in chromium poisoning of Sr-doped LaMnO3-based cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: On identical cells, different cathode atmospheres (dry air or 10% humidified air) and current conditions (no current or 0.75 A/cm(2) cathodic current) are imposed.
Titulo: Roles of humidity and cathodic current in chromium poisoning of Sr-doped LaMnO3-based cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is found that both humidity and cathodic current promote chromium poisoning.
Titulo: Roles of humidity and cathodic current in chromium poisoning of Sr-doped LaMnO3-based cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Microstructural characterizations also confirmed that larger amounts of chromium-containing deposits are present at the cathode/electrolyte interfaces of the cell tested with cathodic current and/or humidity.
Titulo: Roles of humidity and cathodic current in chromium poisoning of Sr-doped LaMnO3-based cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Free energy minimization calculations and thermogravimetric experiments are performed to determine the chromium vapor species that form over chromia-forming alloy interconnect and result in chromium deposition.
Titulo: Roles of humidity and cathodic current in chromium poisoning of Sr-doped LaMnO3-based cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Based on the experimental and computational results, the roles of humidity and cathodic current in chromium poisoning are evaluated, and a mechanism associated to chromium vapor species deposition at the cathode/electrolyte interface is proposed.
Titulo: Roles of humidity and cathodic current in chromium poisoning of Sr-doped LaMnO3-based cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells
